policies.title: No Illegal Activities
policies.description: Job postings must not promote illegal activities

policies.title: Copyright Compliance
policies.description: Job postings should not request work that violates copyright laws

policies.title: No Discrimination
policies.description: Job postings must not discriminate based on protected characteristics, they are allowed to specify universities and years of experience, but are not allowed to discrimnate on race or gender.

policies.title: Clear Compensation
policies.description: Job postings should provide basic compensation information
